Description.English: Tooltips for -ships- in a shipyrad can now display buff properties added to the ship asset if it also contains ItemEffectTarget property. Used to kind of make buff buyable in a shipyard like building (use triggers to provide the buffs after research)
Description.German: Tooltips for -ships- in a shipyrad can now display buff properties added to the ship asset if it also contains ItemEffectTarget property. Used to kind of make buff buyable in a shipyard like building (use triggers to provide the buffs after research)
